code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Adopt.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Adopt=()=>{const[pets,setPets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/pets').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setPets(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching pets:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"adopt-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Available Pets for Adoption"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pets-grid",children:pets.map(pet=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/pet/${pet.id}`,className:"pet-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pet.photo,alt:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:pet.name})]},pet.id))})]});};export default Adopt;
